alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Marquette County through 545 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Champion, or 13 miles northwest of Ishpeming, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail has been previously reported by a trained observer from this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Ishpeming around 525 PM EDT. Ishpeming around 530 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
